product_overview: A single-page portfolio website designed to showcase a developer's skills, projects, and contact information in a visually polished, fast-loading, and accessible format. The site features distinct sections for hero, projects, skills, and contact, enhanced with subtle animated backgrounds and responsive navigation for both desktop and mobile users.
core_goals: Present projects with contextual visuals and links to source code and live demos.
Clearly communicate technical skills and tools used.
Provide an easy and reliable way for prospective employers or clients to contact the developer.
Ensure fast loading times on both desktop and mobile devices.
Maintain accessibility and responsiveness across devices and input methods.
Implement reusable UI components for consistency and maintenance efficiency.
key_features: Hero Section: Full-bleed area with engaging background or animated visuals, including a short introduction and primary calls-to-action.
Projects Section: Display portfolio projects as cards with images, descriptions, tech tags, and links to repositories and live demos; supports filtering by categories or technologies.
Skills Section: Visual representation of technical skills grouped by frontend, backend, and tools, using icons or progress indicators to show competency.
Contact Section: Contact form with fields for name, email, and message, featuring client-side validation, success/failure feedback, and links to social profiles and downloadable résumé.
Animated Background Component: Subtle, performant animated visuals that respect user preferences like reduced-motion.
Responsive Navigation: Sticky navbar with anchor links to page sections and a mobile-friendly collapsible menu.
Accessibility and Performance Enhancements: Semantic HTML, keyboard operability, ARIA labels, optimized images with lazy loading, and minimal JavaScript to speed first paint.
Reusable UI Primitives: Consistent buttons, cards, inputs, and toast notifications used throughout the site.
user_flow_summary: Initial Load: Displays hero and navigation components quickly; animated backgrounds begin if user preferences allow; main content accessible via anchored navigation links.
Project Interaction: Clicking a project card opens a detailed modal or navigates to a detail page showcasing screenshots, descriptions, tech stacks, and links; may include demo or carousel.
Submitting Contact Form: User fills out form validated in real-time, submits it, and sees inline loading followed by toast notifications indicating success or failure; errors offer retry options.
Navigating Sections: Users use the navbar to jump to sections, updating URL hashes to support deep linking and direct access.
Mobile Experience: Collapsible mobile navigation menu; vertically stacked project cards with touch-friendly interactions.
validation_criteria: Homepage loads in under 2 seconds on typical 3G connections or performance optimization plan available.
All interactive elements are keyboard accessible.
Contact form reliably returns success and failure states with appropriate user feedback.
Projects render correctly on all screen sizes and allow users to open detailed views on click or tap.
Empty project lists display a friendly placeholder message.
Contact API failures prompt retry options and preserve user input.
Image load failures are handled gracefully with fallback placeholders.
Animations respect user preferences for reduced motion.
Accessibility audits confirm color contrast, ARIA roles, and semantic markup compliance.
